mapper.select: SELECT milestone_id AS milestoneId, project_id AS projectId, milestone_name AS milestoneName, created_at AS createdAt, updated_at AS updatedAt, start_date AS startDate, end_date AS endDate, achievement_rate AS achievementRate, is_deleted AS isDeleted FROM milestone WHERE project_id = #{projectId} ORDER BY start_date ASC, milestone_id ASC
